version_description:
• Added separate Swipe Left and Tap-and-Hold action settings for read and unread items under Advanced settings
• Added Force Full Re-sync option under Sync Settings. This can be useful if any unread counts are incorrect.
• Fixed a bug leading to incorrect unread counts when unstarring unread items (use Force Full Re-sync under Sync Settings to reset unread counts)
• Fixed swipe from edge not working in full screen mode
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

If you enjoy using Newsify, please consider rating it after each update. This helps us out a lot. Thanks for your support!

• Added separate Swipe Left and Tap-and-Hold action settings for read and unread items under Advanced settings
• Added Force Full Re-sync option under Sync Settings. This can be useful if any unread counts are incorrect.
• Fixed a bug leading to incorrect unread counts when unstarring unread items (use Force Full Re-sync under Sync Settings to reset unread counts)
• Fixed swipe from edge not working in full screen mode
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

If you enjoy using Newsify, please consider rating it after each update. This helps us out a lot. Thanks for your support!

Introducing Newsify Premium - Try it free for 7 days!
• Automatic Full Text: Get full text automatically for most partial feeds and save for offline reading
• More Images: Get more high-res images for feeds with small or no images
• Search Full Text: Search the full text of partial feeds not just the preview
• Priority Support: Be first in line to get all of your questions answered
→ To start your trial: Select Premium in settings and tap "Start free trial"

Note: You'll still be able to use all of the features in the previous version for free in this version. And if you're currently using the ad-free version, you'll still be able to use Newsify ad-free. So, there's no need to worry about updating!

Also in this version:
• Fixed an issue causing the app to crash while syncing
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

• Coming soon: Apple Watch app!

If you enjoy using Newsify, please consider rating it after each update. This helps us out a lot. Thanks for your support!

Introducing Newsify Premium - Try it free for 7 days!
• Automatic Full Text: Get full text automatically for most partial feeds and save for offline reading
• More Images: Get more high-res images for feeds with small or no images
• Search Full Text: Search the full text of partial feeds not just the preview
• Priority Support: Be first in line to get all of your questions answered
→ To start your trial: Select Premium in settings and tap "Start free trial"

Note: You'll still be able to use all of the features in the previous version for free in this version. And if you're currently using the ad-free version, you'll still be able to use Newsify ad-free. So, there's no need to worry about updating!

Also in this version:
• Fixed an issue causing the app to crash while syncing
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

• Coming soon: Apple Watch app!

If you enjoy using Newsify, please consider rating it after each update. This helps us out a lot. Thanks for your support!

• 3D Touch support (requires iPhone 6s or iPhone 6s Plus)
-App Icon: quick access to your first 3 feeds or folders or all unread items
-Article List: press articles to show a preview of the article (swipe up for actions) or change 3D Touch Action setting under Article/Subscription List for more options
-Article/Web Browser: press links to show a preview
• Added Open in Safari & Chrome options to Open Items setting (see Safari Open Action setting under Article/Subscription List, requires iOS 9)
• iPad Pro support
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

If you enjoy using Newsify, please consider rating it after each update. This helps us out a lot. Thanks for your support!

• 3D Touch support (requires iPhone 6s or iPhone 6s Plus)
-App Icon: quick access to your first 3 feeds or folders or all unread items
-Article List: press articles to show a preview of the article (swipe up for actions) or change 3D Touch Action setting under Article/Subscription List for more options
-Article/Web Browser: press links to show a preview
• Added Open in Safari & Chrome options to Open Items setting (see Safari Open Action setting under Article/Subscription List, requires iOS 9)
• iPad Pro support
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

If you enjoy using Newsify, please consider rating it after each update. This helps us out a lot. Thanks for your support!

• If you're using a Newsify account, try the the new fast sync Newsify account:
- Under the Account setting, select Add Account, then Newsify, then Create an account.
- You can import your existing subscriptions and starred items by selecting Import Subscriptions in the subscription list of the new account.
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

• Added in-app Safari View options to Open Links setting (requires iOS 9)
• Added Download Images on Wi-Fi only setting under Article Browser - when enabled, image downloading in the article browser (not web browser) will be disabled when not on Wi-Fi. To disable thumbnail loading in the article list, change Show Thumbnails to Off.
• iOS 10 beta compatibility
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

• Added in-app Safari View options to Open Links setting (requires iOS 9)
• Added Download Images on Wi-Fi only setting under Article Browser - when enabled, image downloading in the article browser (not web browser) will be disabled when not on Wi-Fi. To disable thumbnail loading in the article list, change Show Thumbnails to Off.
• iOS 10 beta compatibility
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

• iOS 10 and watchOS 3 support
• Added widget for iOS 10
-To enable on the lock/home screen on iOS 10, swipe to the right from the lock/home screen and tap Edit at the bottom of the list
-On 3D Touch devices with iOS 10, press on the app icon
• Added hardware keyboard shortcuts for iPad (requires iOS 9 or later, hold down command key to see shortcuts in each view)
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

• Fixed subscription list display issue when showing unread subscriptions only
• Fixed an issue that caused some videos to be muted in the article browser
• Fixed night mode scroll bar
• Fixed saving animated gifs to photos

• Added Full Screen Status Bar setting under Article Browser to allow hiding the status bar in full screen mode
• Changed Pull Up to Mark All to only trigger when scrolled to end of list to help avoid accidentally marking all (for long list, scroll past end of list and let it bounce back before pulling up)
• Added pull to refresh to top-level subscription list
• Added 3D Touch action in subscription list to toggle Show Subscriptions setting (requires 3D Touch capable device)
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

If you enjoy using Newsify, please consider rating it after each update. This helps us out a lot. Thanks for your support!

• Added Full Screen Status Bar setting under Article Browser to allow hiding the status bar in full screen mode
• Changed Pull Up to Mark All to only trigger when scrolled to end of list to help avoid accidentally marking all (for long list, scroll past end of list and let it bounce back before pulling up)
• Added pull to refresh to top-level subscription list
• Added 3D Touch action in subscription list to toggle Show Subscriptions setting (requires 3D Touch capable device)
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

If you enjoy using Newsify, please consider rating it after each update. This helps us out a lot. Thanks for your support!

• Newsify for the web is now available! Go to newsify.co on your computer and click Sign In (requires a Newsify account with a username - see Account setting for more info)
• Added setting for 3D Touch Subscription List action to enable toggling Show Subscriptions setting (disabled by default, under Article/Subscription List)
• Added extra huge article font size for iPad
• Additional bug fixes and improvements
